name: Hampton Inn Los Angeles / Carson / Torrance

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here twice, one night each time, while going to and from LAX for vacation. I'm a huge fan of Hampton Inns and this was a great experience, as always. The staff accomodated our late arrival and early departure. The bed was extremely comfortable, the room itself was quiet and clean. Because we are Hilton Diamond members, we were upgraded to a larger room that had a small sofa in it. Of course the location is not glamorous but it's conveniently located next to the freeways. We chose this particular location because we booked with Hilton points and it was far and away cheaper than any nearby property. The bathroom is small but we were only here for a short stay so it didn't matter. I would stay again if in the area and needed a comfortable accomodation.
reviews.title: Super Comfortable

reviews.text: This is an older Hampton Inn. Not only it is close to freeway, it is actually back to freeway with potential noise for some travelers. In and out of freeway is very, very convenient. It is a very good option if you are catching a flight at LAX and has a car. A bit far, but easy to get to the airport in 10-15 minutes without traffic. But be aware, gas stations might be difficult to find. There is only one, cash or ATM only, half mile away. The hotel itself is OK, old, but well maintained and clean. The best part of this hotel is people, great service and very helpful during my stay. Request a room facing the street to avoid noise issues. Otherwise, this is a typical, well managed older Hampton.
reviews.title: Older Hampton, back to freeway, great service

reviews.text: Very nice room and decor, with a Starbuck's down the road! Used Hilton Honor points and was an excellent value for the money. Close to major attractions, yet far enough away from the hustle and bustle of the big city. Another happy customer :)
reviews.title: A Well-Kept Secret
Nice remodeled Hampton
reviews.text: Nice, clean Hampton that is right off the freeway. I had a room on the opposite side of the freeway so there were no issues with noise. There are a few fast food/restaurants within walking distance. The room itself was very nice & recently updated. As others have noted, the bathroom is pretty small. Bed was super comfortable. They had the usual selection of Hampton breakfast items with plenty of seating. Overall this is a good choice.

This location was next to the 91 freeway eastbound, so of course I asked for a room on the opposite side of the freeway. I stayed at this location at two different times during my vacay to Cali. First, when I flew in late over the weekend and again when I was to fly back after my wonderful vacay was sadly over. I would fair a guess and say that the hotel has been updated recently.On both times, the rooms were small and the restroom is also small in comparison to the other Hamptons that I have stayed in. But it did have both a fridge and a microwave - which was great. The staff is friendly and in fact allowed me to check in a little early. The beds were comfy and clean as were the rooms. I did not like the selection of tv stations avaiable and no onscreen guide to view the available channels. The breakfast was plentiful and very good. Also, there are some eateries located very close. I would return to this location.
reviews.title: Hampton Inn - Two Stays

reviews.text: This is a normal, fine Hampton Inn that should be so familiar to travellers around the country. There is an even quality to the establishments we've stayed at on both coasts and in between. I've been reading about the location of the hotel; for a stay, it is perfectly fine, those sensitive to background noise should ask for a room opposite of the bustling Highway 91 bisecting the LA County region.
reviews.title: Acceptable Hampton Inn convenient to Freeways

reviews.text: I agree with other, the service, quality and facilities reputation of Hampton Inn (moderately priced lodging, tasty and nutritious breakfast, cheerful service) are maintained and then some by the Hampton Inn Carson, Ca.
reviews.title: Usual Hampton with good attitude staff

reviews.text: As noted, this is a fairly normal Hampton. Front desk staff was very friendly. The hotel is quite clean and the breakfast was exactly the same as you find at all Hamptons.
reviews.title: Friendly Hotel Run By Happy Henry

reviews.text: A few concerns:
reviews.title: Hampton standards upheld

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Despite diamond status and a reservation a week in advance, I was assigned to a smoking room. For one night that wasn't too bad, but no way would I do that again without a guarantee that I could have a non-smoking room. I thought all hamptons were smoke free? Guess not.
reviews.title: very convenient for the highway

reviews.text: This is a really nice Hampton Inn with clean rooms and a helpful staff. It was nice having the refrigerator in the room. It appears the property went through a renovation recently – the rooms and public areas looked fresh and up to date. The hotels location is reasonably close to restaurants and right off the highway. If absolutely would recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Clean, Helpful & Friendly

reviews.text: We always enjoying at the Hampton Inn & Suites because they have the friendliest staff. The continental breakfast is good, fast and easy way to start the day.
reviews.title: Nice facility, questionable area.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Convenient location. Very pleasantly surprised by the outstanding breakfast selection. Rooms appear to be recently renovated. Having a refrigerator and microwave oven made things very convenient. Best of all, though, was the service provided by the friendly, efficient staff. Would definitely stay there again.
reviews.title: Great place to stay

reviews.text: nice remodeled room with very good mattress. excellent rates
reviews.title: newly remodeled

reviews.text: Even though this was out of the way, I stayed here since it was the cheapest Hilton property in LA. For the most part, it was a typical Hampton, but a few things made me decide to cancel my next trip there:
reviews.title: Try not to get the room on the freeway side.

reviews.text: We are currently completing a three day stay at this property. Over the years we probably stayed at 50 Hampton Inns and were always so pleased that we made them our choice for budget accommodations. This hotel is a bit "off" in our opinion. It is located in a delta between an on/off ramp and the freeway. While we scored a room facing the ramps, there still is plenty of noise, the windows are not double paned and the a/c beneath he windows lets in plenty of noise through the vent. The room is considerably smaller in comparison to others, the mattress feels uncomfortable, the duvet content slides down the bottom at the end of the bed, the small fridge is noisy with water circulation noises, the bathroom is tiny, the towels are of lower quality, there is a different shower curtain, but worst of all the toilet does not work right. I reported it, but the maintenance guy just smiled at me and said that it's normal to flush two or three times.
reviews.title: NOT WHAT I EXPECTED

reviews.text: Otherwise it is a clean room, nicely appointed, with a fridge, micro wave and coffee machine. Breakfast is included with the standard offerings available. They have a small pool which we did not use. Parking is free as was the Internet. Obviously it's a very convenient location to/from the freeway. Staff was friendly. But for the price we are paying we are disappointed customers, not the usual standard. Maybe I am too picky, we were just unlucky, it's an older property. We have another reservation at a different property tomorrow, let's wait and see.
reviews.title: Nice stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I needed a room for one night near Long Beach for business and used Hilton Honors points to book this Hampton Inn. I've stayed here about 3 years ago and remember it being a pleasant hotel with the only problem being highway noise if you get a room facing the freeway. I requested a room on the opposite side and was accomodated with no problems.
reviews.title: Excellent stay

reviews.text: The hotel appears to be refurbed since I last stayed here and I found it to be very nice with clean rooms and a fridge and microwave in my room.
reviews.title: Excellent Follow Up - Customer Service

reviews.text: I enjoyed my brief stay and wouldn't hesitate to stay here again, everything went smoothly and staff was efficient and polite.
reviews.title: Great stop on a LA vacation
